description: Official Google AI blog posts and announcements

items.title: Google and the Massachusetts AI Hub are launching a new AI training initiative for the Commonwealth.
items.description: Google is partnering with the Massachusetts AI Hub to provide every Baystater with no-cost access to Google’s AI training.

items.title: Get more context and understand translations more deeply with new AI-powered updates in Translate.
items.description: New alternatives, “understand” and “ask” buttons in Google Translate help you navigate the complexities of natural language.

items.title: Build with Nano Banana 2, our best image generation and editing model
items.description: Nano Banana 2 (Gemini 3.1 Flash Image) delivers Pro-level intelligence and fidelity for all image applications.

items.title: Nano Banana 2: Combining Pro capabilities with lightning-fast speed
items.description: Our latest image generation model offers advanced world knowledge, production-ready specs, subject consistency and more, all at Flash speed.

items.title: A more intelligent Android on Samsung Galaxy S26
items.description: At Samsung Unpacked 2026, we showcased how Samsung Galaxy S26 devices are getting the latest in Android’s AI features.

items.title: See the whole picture and find the look with Circle to Search
items.description: We’ve updated Circle to Search so you can now explore multiple items in a single image.

items.title: “No technology has me dreaming bigger than AI”
items.description: Sundar Pichai gave remarks at the opening ceremony of the AI Impact Summit. Read a transcript of his speech.

items.title: AI Impact Summit 2026
items.description: A look at the partnerships and investments Google announced at the AI Impact Summit 2026.

items.title: A new way to express yourself: Gemini can now create music
items.description: Lyria 3 is now available in the Gemini app. Create custom, high-quality 30-second tracks from text and images.

items.title: AI Impact Summit 2026: How we’re partnering to make AI work for everyone
items.description: An overview of Google’s new global partnerships and funding announcements at the AI Impact Summit in India.

items.title: Our 2026 Responsible AI Progress Report
items.description: A look at our 2026 Responsible AI Progress Report.

items.title: Gemini 3 Deep Think: Advancing science, research and engineering
items.description: We’re releasing a major upgrade to Gemini 3 Deep Think, our specialized reasoning mode.

items.title: 9 fun questions to try asking Google Photos
items.description: Learn more about Google Photos’ new Ask button as well as other functions of its Ask Photos feature.

items.title: Helping kids and teens learn and grow online on Safer Internet Day
items.description: We’re sharing our latest updates designed to support families, kids and teens in the digital world.

items.title: Natively Adaptive Interfaces: A new framework for AI accessibility
items.description: Learn how Google's NAI framework uses AI to make technology more adaptive, inclusive and helpful for everyone.

items.title: How Google Cloud is helping Team USA elevate their tricks with AI
items.description: Google Cloud built an industry-first AI tool to help U.S. Ski and Snowboard athletes.

items.title: Watch our new Gemini ad ahead of football’s biggest weekend
items.description: Learn more about Google’s new ad that will run during football’s Big Game on February 8.

items.title: The latest AI news we announced in January
items.description: Google AI announcements from January

items.title: How we’re helping preserve the genetic information of endangered species with AI
items.description: Scientists are working to sequence the genome of every known species on Earth.

items.title: Advancing AI benchmarking with Game Arena
items.description: We’re expanding Game Arena with Poker and Werewolf, while Gemini 3 Pro and Flash top our chess leaderboard.
